website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Burns - Agoura was a popular training shoe among the masses. It received high marks for being comfortable and trendy, as well as fitting as expected. Other highlights included the affordable price and the lightweight nature of the trainer. On the other hand, the fit received mixed reviews, ranging from having a too small and narrow fit to being too big and wide. Overall, this model met the expectations of many for their workout, walking, and casual needs.
pros: Almost all of the users agreed that the Skechers Burns - Agoura was comfortable
A staggering number of consumers were impressed by its true-to-size measurement
Multiple individuals enjoyed using it for casual use, short walks, and light workouts
Numerous admirers adored the stylish design and colorways of the footgear
Plenty of buyers deemed it of good value for its affordable price
Many testers liked that this workout shoes from Skechers felt light on the feet
A few purchasers were delighted with its plush cushioning
A couple of wearers praised the adequate support that the midsole provided
The shoe seemed to be durable to several reviewers
cons: Various critics had conflicting views on the fit
some opined that the shoe was too small and tight, while the others found it too big and wide
A smattering of detractors was dissatisfied with its insufficient support

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: My man loves these. He was always moaning about his feet hurting where he is on his feet all day as a trades men. I brought these and he loves them. His feet sweat less and he said they are more comfortable than wearing nothing on your feet. He will never buy anything else for work. He would probably wear all the time if more on tread as would I with the female range.
customer_reviews.author: Emmily Collis

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Great and comfortable at first, however began to smell after only a couple of weeks, (I haven’t had this problem before or after) tried washing them to which they just basically shrunk and started to hurt. Shame because we’re great at first. Won’t buy another pair of sketchers again.
customer_reviews.author: LMART

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: dad loved these there so comfy he has heel pain etc and they are so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Not to sound clichéd but it is like walking on a cloud. Having had issues with foot/back/everything pains for years these shoes are of great quality and better yet, at a great price. The rubber insoles are particularly good. I doth my hat to you Sketchers.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Belfast

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for me Size 8 UK And SUPER COMFORTABLE! Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes and doe due the color , could even be used as formal shoes to some degree as they have a nice suede look to them. Obviously these are designed more for exercise and running for which they are perfect and ensure your heels don't tire as you have this cushioning which is not too common with the average pair of sneakers. Obviously would highly recommend. I paid Peanuts for them, less then 40 Pounds My budget was £2500 and I generally like high end luxury designer shoes however these were great and the rest can go to support British Nationalist Organisation who I support Like EDL and BNP
customer_reviews.author: moses hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad as he is always claiming the shoes he buys are not that comfortable for walking. I love Skechers and own several pairs myself so told him to try them and he absolutely loves them. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nuasolas

customer_reviews.title: Comes from Poland so may take a while to arrive
customer_reviews.text: bought for hubby who has a prosthetic foot so needed wide fitting shoes. these fit the bill perfectly. took a while to be delivered as came from Poland but shoes are great and worth the wait. Hubby very pleased with these and wears them everyday for work and leisure.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Give your feet a treat!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Sketchers and they are so comfortable when in the gym it makes the workouts so much better knowing your feet are not going to be sore after a gruelling bootcamp session. Would recommend these trainers 100% 👍.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Seaforth

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously comfy
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought these shoes I just saw them as a budget pair of decent looking trainers that I could use casually and at work. However, these things are the comfiest trainer I've worn, I struggle to tell whether my slippers are more comfortable or not. Also having recently had surgery on my legs I was required to find a durable pair whilst being light and these delivered exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very soft trainers
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo soft. Really comfortable for day to day use. But they aren't very grippy and probably too soft for any real sporting activities. Buy knowing what your getting, which is just comfortable shoes for not a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skechers tend to be good...
customer_reviews.text: This is a provisional review because I only just have them but they look as good as my last Skechers purchase and they were great. I buy half a size larger and that works out great for me with their products. I am not dumb enough to to spend a fortune on trainers for the name but if you go too low the quality drops off really badly - these Skechers are not very expensive and if they are like my last pair they will be excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Derek E.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality,
customer_reviews.text: Disliked that they are very narrow at the front and with in one week of having then the back of the shoe had warn away leaving plastic to continually run my heel and leave it really sore, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Alistair wallis

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable...really
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these after trying them on at the local shop. I get pain in the ball of my left foot so needed something that I could exercise in. I got a size up but I like this so it is a very broad fit with lots of room for socks etc. Love Sketchers.
customer_reviews.author: jane m.

customer_reviews.title: Fit Okay, Comfortable Memory Foam
customer_reviews.text: The memory foam in the sole of these shoes are not like the flimsy ones from the pound shop. These are firm enough to slowly take your weight. They are very comfortable. The fit was a bit snug. It fit good but I think it may have been just slightly snug because of the memory foam. This is very slight though, I would describe the item as pretty much fitting as expected
customer_reviews.author: Rafa

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday shoes
customer_reviews.text: Needed a decent pair of everyday shoes for walks etc. Need good support as I am a b\k amputee. These are the best Skechers I have bought and at a very good price. The memory foam is comfortable & light.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Within 48 hours the inner lining was coming off and digging into my ankle. For someone with diabetes this could have at worst meant they'd be losing a foot in the future due to lack of feeling they can experience in their lower limbs. Would not recommend these trainers and instead go to a proper sports clothing store to buy some for £3 extra
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Burton

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband in size 12 UK (normally he is an 11.5UK) due to the memory foam insole these are a perfect fit. Comfortable and with a good strong sole, very pleased and they were around £39 so great price. Delivered promptly. Highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Allott

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent comfort. These will be used just to wear as normal everyday footwear and as I am on my feet 10-12 hours at a time it pays to get decent shoes. As far as I am concerned they are a Swiss Army shoe - does everything!
customer_reviews.author: Had

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: They are everything I expected. A recent convert to Sketchers. They are lightweight and very comfortable. They are classed as sportswear but I don't think I would use them for running. Still I am very pleased with look, comfort and value for money
customer_reviews.author: olliedoodle

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad who is 86. He'd seen some walking trainers advertised but I persuaded him to give Sketchers a try. He said they are extremely comfortable, just what he wanted and that he can't wait to get back to walking everywhere once lockdown has been lifted. They were also less expensive than the non branded ones he'd seen advertised so he's very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've got osteoarthritis in both knees. The lightest and most comfortable trainer's i ever worn.I won't wear any other brand anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: They’re very light and very comfortable, I’ve fallen asleep two nights on the trott !!! They are new so am unable to tell you how long they’ll last but I ordered another pair which I have not checked still boxed.
customer_reviews.author: P chambers

customer_reviews.title: Just the job......
customer_reviews.text: This trainers are my third pair, so as you can tell I love them. They are so light that you hardly feel you are wearing any trainers. I would recommend the trainers, and once they finally wear out, i will be replacing them with....yes, you guessed it another pair.
customer_reviews.author: chris wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic trainers, high quality, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Wow. These trainers are so fantastic. They are really, really comfortable and it is like walking on air. Great price, great value for money, purchased a second pair as I loved them so much. Very highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Tara250

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy shoes with memory foam inner sole
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair I bought since they are so comfy. They have a memory foam innersole which is very comfortable when walking.
customer_reviews.author: M. Beers

customer_reviews.title: Fewer small stones in the soles
customer_reviews.text: These add to a pair that are a half size smaller. I notice that the soles of the new pair are slightly different and don't pick up so many small stones as do the other pair. I would prefer if they didn't have 'S' and the name emblazoned on them though these have been camouflaged to some extent using a black marker pen.
customer_reviews.author: N Hulme

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for sons Christmas present size 13 and they were very good fit and very comfortable Uses them for work and he reports that he feels like he is walking on air Would recommend arrived as specified
customer_reviews.author: lucia Young

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable. Its like you're walking on cushions
customer_reviews.text: Use them for work. Extremely comfortable. Its like you're walking on cushions. Also a decent fit for people with wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: ben7ani

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought here for my dad who suffers with painful feet but very active. He was so pleased with these as they are really comfortable but look good too.
customer_reviews.author: lauren rayner

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time well packaged
customer_reviews.text: As the item was bought as a present I can't really comment , though the recipient is very happy with them,good fit very comfortable and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: john bowie

customer_reviews.title: Superb Comfort
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable, I have a wide foot and these are perfect. I walk a lot and they are so good. Looking for other colours in the same style.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. J. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Sketches
customer_reviews.text: Delivered very fast, product looked good and the size was also good. I have used a number of times and they are comfortable so thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: modmir

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They're as lightweight as I'd hoped and comfortable to walk in. I find them a tad tricky to lace up securely, but that is probably just my lack of digital dexterity! I was a bit surprised to get a slight static electric shock as I got out of the car the first time I wore them, but it seems to be a one-off. I'm happy with the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: ALMcc

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely comfortable and light. No regret buying this. Has a very long leg and couldn't see my size in Female Checkers. Had to opt for male and I make do to say it's unisex.
customer_reviews.author: Nmeso Favour

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers eh?
customer_reviews.text: My second pair as I cannot believe how light and comfortable they are. Really good and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: UK Buyer

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT Wide or Relaxed fit they are a Regular fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very good value trainers, but I was deceived by some of the reviews claiming these were Wide or a Relaxed fit as they are actually listed as Regular fit and feel that way. They just about fit me, but I have a wider foot so I would have preferred a wider size.
customer_reviews.author: Ator

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and well built shoe. They are exactly what I was looking for to replace my old commute and park walking trainer shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: ITEM RECEIVED ONE TRAINER DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: Left foot was damaged, right foot was okay, lucky for me I was covered with A-Z CLAIM
customer_reviews.author: KA$H

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Husband has fallen in love with these. They are so light and comfortable. Would highly recommend. Arrived on time and well packaged. Fit was true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Material already rubbing away
customer_reviews.text: Had them for 3-5 months material rubbing away on the heel so I need a new pair. If you're planning on doing a lot of walking do not buy these
customer_reviews.author: ryan geraghty

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fast delivery, excellent service
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skechers as a gift for my husband from the children for father's day and they fit to perfection and are really lightweight and comfortable. Super fast delivery too and arrived in time for father's day and long before the anticipated delivery date so thank you for a great service.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comfort
customer_reviews.text: They are just the best trainers i have ever worn. So comfortable this is my 3rd pair. They only seem to last about a year. But great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers are pure quality
customer_reviews.text: They're sketchers... Nuff said. Comfortable from day one. Memory foam is a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: David Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough, but that’s for me. Other wise a nice light weight trainer.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these Men’s burns sketchers trainers,nice light weight trainer,as I’m a shoe size 10, and I’ve a wide ball end of my feet,I thought I would order a 10 and half,but I still found them a bit close fitting still. It’s still early days with them ,im not wearing them every day,just to get used to them.nice bouncy feel when walking,and soft inner sole,as there memory foam. Still pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Best trainers for light work.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased another pair and I use them for work but alternate between the two . The lip opens up after a while but a little glue should fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. OH says it’s like putting a pair of old comfy slippers on but much better looking! Must be good as he’s not had them off his feet since I got them for him
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Green

customer_reviews.title: They shrink!
customer_reviews.text: Not up to standards I would expect from sketchers! They are not waterproof, which I didn't expect them to be due to material, but any warmth to dry them causes them to shrink, even the soal of the shoes shrunk. In the bin after less than 2 months, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B. Malcolmson

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I've had several pairs of sketchers, they always fit and are always comfortable. I will carry on ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: sandy s

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fitted straight from box light and comfortable sole design picks up gravel pieces but otherwise a good choice Not a sports shoe just ‘smart casual’
customer_reviews.author: Timbo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice wide toe room and very comfortable so I’m told!
customer_reviews.author: P E.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy chinese fakes
customer_reviews.text: Just to let everyone know on the back off the box there made in China not LA
customer_reviews.author: RENE KUHN

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The recipient was very pleased but hope they last longer than last pair of Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good for everyday casual use. I do not use for sport (running for example) so cannot comment on their durability, but they are lasting well for light use.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Good fit on wider feet
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and am a 7 1/2. These are a perfect fit, as I like a little space for my toes. Very comfortable and look ok too.
customer_reviews.author: Viney

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic trainers as Skechers always are they fit absolutely perfect and they are the comfiest trainers I have ever had
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Neville

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Nice but totally poor fabric on back of trainers, torn up just by using it for a few weeks, back had completely deteriorated and padding under foot seems to have shrunk somehow
customer_reviews.author: Welshy

customer_reviews.title: happy feet
customer_reviews.text: only just bought these so i cant vouch for their longivity ,i have worn them for a day or two and they are light weight and comftable
customer_reviews.author: rick darby

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable but shown signs of wear after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Rowlands1893

customer_reviews.title: Leakers
customer_reviews.text: These shoes leaked in a heavy downpour Spent all day in Carlisle with wet feet Not 😆 happy
customer_reviews.author: gloriana

customer_reviews.title: Like having your slippers on
customer_reviews.text: Fab shoes, walked for 2 hours after they arrived. So comfortable. Will probably get another colour
customer_reviews.author: cambrian5963

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Husband relys on these sketchers as its the only comfortable pair he can wear after a traumatic foor break last year. Dont know what he is going to do once they discontinue this model :/. Hes over the moon to get this new pair as his other pair got worn down. 5stars!
customer_reviews.author: miss rachel yates

customer_reviews.title: You can walk pain free all day
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and you can walk all day in the shoes without discomfort. Great price well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: rob63

customer_reviews.title: Comfortableness
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable pair of trainers I have ever purchased. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MR RICHARD PARKER

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Nice plain black trainers and fit well on first wear. Usual sketches comfort and quality.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are soft but offer the necessary support when on my feet for hours at a time at work.
customer_reviews.author: E. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good value , Comfortable trainer
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product with the memory foam insole very comfortable from the start. Have had these shoes before and found it best to order a half size larger than normal shoe size
customer_reviews.author: Peter H

customer_reviews.title: Very very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I walk all day on concrete floors. These shoes are the best I’ve ever had, so comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: GB01

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for people who have some balance problems and sore knees
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my dad has bad feet and great for his balance
customer_reviews.author: Pish

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: For the price very badly made and wear out very quickly. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Red devil power.

customer_reviews.title: The word "Sketchers" says it all
customer_reviews.text: Quality, light weight, well made & comfortable No need to say anything else about Sketchers 😊
customer_reviews.author: Bob the wing

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: they are present for son fit him well said very comfortable. loves them
customer_reviews.author: Ron G.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for work too
customer_reviews.text: If you spend hours on your feet, these are awesome 'work' shoes too. So comfortable and light
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish,comfortable and very good value for money
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I don't like about these trainers very comftable,stylish,and hard wearing ilk never go to any other trainer now I love these sketchers
customer_reviews.author: Colin froggatt

customer_reviews.title: Walking in the Air
customer_reviews.text: As usual the skechers trainers feel comfy and feel like walking on air. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: RobF

customer_reviews.title: should have got ages ago
customer_reviews.text: wow wearing for 8-9 hours a day so light doing great so far ,deciding if I should by another pair while there in the sale
customer_reviews.author: Mr Iain Lodge

customer_reviews.title: A great pair of trainers
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, nice looking trainers that fit perfectly. I can't complain, especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: A. Listener

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable as I wear them for work. Fit perfectly and look good. Very quick service and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: These are the second pair i have brought for my partner he said they fit like a glove so comfortable and they look nice when on
customer_reviews.author: alma lawson

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable trainers I’ve ever had, Arrived in 2 days Excellent price
customer_reviews.author: teresa parker

customer_reviews.title: Not The same as the last one I bought two years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I had this shoe before and its not the same as my last one I bought two years ago from different seller. The memory foam is too flimsy and my socks keep sliding up and down when I walk which is weird. Might be a fake ?
customer_reviews.author: P Williams

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love them u don't even feel like you are wearing them and it's like walking on air
customer_reviews.author: dan broughton

customer_reviews.title: Great but stitching came apart
customer_reviews.text: The stitching on top of the left toe has come apart . Only worn on a few occasions. Can't find any where to contact the vendor !!!
customer_reviews.author: EDDIE G

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy, great for work and at home. Fit well. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable I work in a shop doing long hrs and this is a good trainer to wire
customer_reviews.author: Gc patel

customer_reviews.title: Good Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking trainers and correct size. However the area under the toes is a bit ridgy which is probably down to the memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: A. WINFIELD

customer_reviews.title: Good quality trainers.
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are a present for Christmas so I don't know if they fit yet.. but they do look really nice. I'm sure my husband will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Collapsing already
customer_reviews.text: The trainers are comfortable but within 6 weeks of receiving them the memory foam insole is collapsing and full of holes. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Extremely comfortable. Can walk for miles in them🥰
customer_reviews.author: Christine N

customer_reviews.title: very comforable and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: brought for family. Cant go wrong with these. Great price for great trainers. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband very pleased with them, perfect fit and very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Males

customer_reviews.title: Gets the thumbs up from Hubby
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Husband who is very fussy, infact he wanted me to order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Margi

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly and are the most comfortable pair of trainers I think I have ever owned. Delivery was very quick with no hassles at all. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Pemberton

customer_reviews.title: Super Skechers
customer_reviews.text: Have bought several pairs of these over the years and never been disappointed. Absolutely brilliant
customer_reviews.author: D. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Super light, super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Light and very comfortable - my 4th pair of Skechers: slip-ons, then deck shoes, heavy boots and now trainers. I love the brand. I’m on my feet all day and they help massively.
customer_reviews.author: N.G. Luke

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: My first review on Amazon , my first pair of Sketchers and so comfy , definitely recommended. But a word of caution , my price also increased when ordering , the price advertised does not include VAT . Nevertheless they are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Hegarty

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but poor duration
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable but after only three months they are starting to fall apart. The seem has started to come away and the soles are coming off at both front and back. A great casual shoe but not for a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Pearse Martin

customer_reviews.title: how wide the size are with the shoe size
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the shoe if they have been wider I would have kept them as I needed them for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: p j jones

customer_reviews.title: Skechers for comfort
customer_reviews.text: As always with Skechers they are so easy to wear and comfortable from first putting them on.
customer_reviews.author: MRS. A. Roulston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant trainers great fit and very comfortable. ...fast delivery from a great sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Euan McLaren

customer_reviews.title: Reliable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and great on the feet. However as I only own one pair of shoes at a time wear and tear is greatly increased and the shoe doesnt last as long. However I have had 2 of the exact type and make so that counts for something.
customer_reviews.author: Tevin Nam-Hing

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Burns 52635-bbk Low-Top Sneakers
feature_bullets: Skechers Burns Agoura Athletic Style Trainers.
